short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,e: Gopass Bridge allows searching and inserting login credentials from the gopass password manager.
short.de: Gopass Bridge ermöglicht das Durchsuchen und Einfügen von Anmeldedaten aus dem Gopass Passwort Manager.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,e: Gopass (https://www.gopass.pw) is the awesome command line password manager. This plugin enables input of login credentials from gopass. To access gopass, a native app has to be configured in the browser in addition to this plugin. The native app is a wrapper that calls gopass-jsonapi to communicate via stdin/stdout. For details on configuring native messaging, see the plugin development page on https://github.com/gopasspw/gopass-jsonapi/blob/master/README.md
long.de: Gopass (https://www.gopass.pw) is the awesome command line password manager. This plugin enables input of login credentials from gopass. To access gopass, a native app has to be configured in the browser in addition to this plugin. The native app is a wrapper that calls gopass with the jsonapi parameter to communicate via stdin/stdout. For details on configuring native messaging, see the plugin development page on https://github.com/gopasspw/gopassbridge
